org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary

Class MapillaryLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.Layer
      • org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.AbstractModifiableLayer
        • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.MapillaryLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSetListener, ProjectionChangeListener, MapViewPaintable, MapView.EditLayerChangeListener, MapView.LayerChangeListener, Destroyable

    public class MapillaryLayer
extends AbstractModifiableLayer
implements DataSetListener, MapView.EditLayerChangeListener, MapView.LayerChangeListener
    This class represents the layer shown in JOSM. There can only exist one instance of this object.
    Author:
    nokutu

        Returns:
        The unique isntance of this class.

      • download

        public void download()
        Downloads all images of the area covered by the OSM data. This is only just for automatic download.

      • checkAreaTooBig

        private void checkAreaTooBig()
        Checks if the area of the OSM data is too big. This means that probably lots of Mapillary images are going to be downloaded, slowing down the program too much. To solve this the automatic is stopped, an alert is shown and you will have to download areas manually.

      • getMapillaryData

        public MapillaryData getMapillaryData()
        Returns the MapillaryData object, which acts as the database of the Layer.
        Returns:
        The MapillaryData object that stores the database.
